story_arceus_05_09000/2401_1001_0200_10:
I still remember how excited I was when I
met you.
story_arceus_05_09000/2401_1001_0300_10:
This warmth in my heart... It’s the answer
to everything.
story_arceus_05_09000/2401_1001_0400_10: Thanks for being here, in this world...
story_arceus_05_09000/2401_1001_0600_10: Our souls... They echo each other.
story_arceus_05_09000/2401_1001_0700_10: This is my and Lugia’s bond as a sync pair!
story_arceus_05_09000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Yeah! And it’ll be even MORE fun when we
crush you!
story_arceus_05_09000/2401_1001_1700_10: It all comes down to whose bond is stronger!
story_arceus_05_09000/2401_1001_1900_10: Ho-Oh and I are the strongest sync pair.
story_arceus_05_09000/2401_1001_2100_10: Not a chance! Lugia and I are the strongest!
story_arceus_05_09000/2401_1001_2200_10: My Pokémon’s the greatest in the world!
story_arceus_05_09000/2401_1001_2500_10: My training’s still not good enough...?
story_arceus_05_09000/2401_1001_2600_10:
My Pokémon are so weak, it makes me
frustrated...
story_arceus_05_09000/2401_1001_2700_10:
But I can feel that they’re getting better after
each battle...
story_arceus_05_09000/2401_1001_3600_10: An exercise nut like him ran out of steam?
story_arceus_05_09000/2401_1001_3700_10:
What kind of training has he been doing,
Lugia?
story_arceus_05_09000/2401_1001_3800_10:
Hmph! Now I can’t even complain to him
about losing.
story_arceus_05_09000/2401_1001_3900_10:
You really are something too, Ethan.
It’s because of you...
story_arceus_05_09000/2401_1001_4000_10: that my dream can live on.
